note.p: Birth: Biggin, near Oundle, Northamptonshire, England (01 April 1803)
Death: His vicarage, Sibbertoft, near Market Harborough (30 July 1889)
Education: Rugby School; Christ's College, Cambridge. BA (1825), MA (1828)

Career: Ordained (1826); Curate, St John's, Margate, Kent (1829); Perpetual Curate, Apethorpe and Wood Newton, Northamptonshire (1833); was on the Government Commission on the potato disease (1845); Vicar of Sibbertoft (1868)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1889-1890 vol 47 pp ix-xii signed by J D H
